author: sibkatya
content: Hi guys) If my enclave is stopped, is there any way to quikly restart it? Smth like `kurtosis start --enclave my-enclave`. Or I  need to re-run it using source and args every time?

author: barnabasbusa
content:
you shouldnâ€™t need to stop it. Only time you should stop it is when you kill it. 
Your slots will keep progressing forward based on time and your chain will get unfinalized very fast
